member.name: M:ParaglidingWeather.Helpers.DirectionBuilder.Get8WindDirection(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the 8-wind compase rose direction for a given degree.
member.param: The value of the compass degree.
member.returns: The direction for a give degree.
